translation.Name: Russia Note - Coalition
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: It's been a flurry of activity the past few days so I haven't had the chance to write an entry - Russia has joined the Coalition, and I've been assigned to set up a forward operating base. After surveying the coastline we picked a relatively accessible oil rig to secure and begin helping survivors. Scouts are reporting that a large region North of Moscow is completely irradiated, so we'll have to be careful of the fallout. Reinforcements are already on their way to help us take a headquarters on the mainland, and several nuclear submarines in the area are rendezvousing with us here.
